name: Staircase Supremacy
description:
Welcome to Staircase Supremacy! This game was made for the #171 Trijam, whose theme was "Watch your step".

In this game, your job is to be the last man standing in the battle for supremacy of a staircase. You may conquer unoccupied steps of the stairs, and also the steps belonging to other factions if their stickmen are not on the step or are paralyzed. 

Your character may only be on one step at a time. However, they may place down tacks, which will paralyze an opponent that dares step onto one of your territories. But watch your step - your opponents can do the same. If you are paralyzed, opponents can ignore you and take a step of your territory even if you're standing on it! 

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move the Camera around

Left Click - attempt to take a territory
